body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Wilson Motors customer support. My name is Bobby Wilson. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Hannah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed because the online inventory does not match the actual availability of cars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Hannah. Can you provide me with your phone number, so I can look up your account details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight six seven five three oh nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Hannah, for sharing that information. I will look into the issue with the inventory discrepancy. Your feedback is valuable. Is there anything else you'd like to add before we end the conversation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that covers it. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Hannah. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
